POPCharge.description: This is representing a product offering price (charge) based on both the basic cost to develop and produce products and the enterprises policy on revenue targets. This price may be further revised through discounting (a Product Offering Price that reflects an alteration).

validFor.description: The period for which the productOfferingPrice is valid

priceType.description: A category that describes the price charge, such as recurring, penalty, One time fee and so forth.

unitOfMeasure.description: A number and unit representing denominator of a rate. For example, for a data charge rate of $2 per 5 GB usage, the amount of unitOfMeasure will be 5 with units as GB.

recurringChargePeriod.description:
The period type to repeat the application of the price
Could be month, week...

recurringChargePeriodLength.description: the period of the recurring charge:  1, 2, ... .It sets to zero if it is not applicable

lastUpdate.description: the last update time of this ProductOfferingPrice

lifecycleStatus.description: the lifecycle status of this ProductOfferingPrice

constraint.description: The Constraint resource represents a policy/rule applied to ProductOfferingPrice.
